actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that infants born to medicaid eligible women are continuously eligible for benefits under such title for 1 year.

summary.text: Amends title XIX (Medicaid) of the Social Security Act to provide that infants born to Medicaid-eligible women are continuously eligible for benefits under such title for one year.

titles.title: A bill to amend title XIX of the Social Security Act to provide that infants born to medicaid eligible women are continuously eligible for benefits under such title for 1 year.
